Html:
Hello.
When I play a video without changing the configuration, I have a blank between my eye.
So what is the steps to calibrate it ?
Maybe using the grid or the cubeMono will help ?

I tried with OP - KL -NM but I didn't know where is the best calibration.
So I know how to calibrate it. But not how to GOOD calibrate it...

Hi!

For calibration I use the default grid image. If you are using the oculus rift, everything should be calibrated by default.
You can try changing manually the horizontal offset in tools->settings->display just in case there is a problem with the shortcuts.
In the next version I should support presets so it will be easier to manage and reset calibration data.

-Stephane
